 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיצִת‎</span> **noun feminine** ==tassel, lock== (√ dubious; Late Hebrew ***id.***, so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיצִיתָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hair on forehead***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> absolute [[Num.15.38|Num 15:38]]; [[Num.15.39|Num 15:39]] ***tassel*** on flowing ends (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּנְפֵי‎</span>) of garments, construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכָּנָף‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> v[[Num.15.38|Num 15:38]] (see [[BDB#Kennedy|Kennedy]]<sup>Hast. DB ii. 69. FRINGES</sup>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ראֹשִׁי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צ‎</span> [[Ezek.8.3|Ezek 8:3]] ***lock*** of hair on forehead. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיקְלַג‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִקְלַג‎</span>
